mapper.select: SELECT /* COGpcReceiveRestMapper.selectGpcEdctnList */ edctn_seq as kap_seq , gpc_edctn_type as edu_type , gpc_parnt_ctgry as ctgry , gpc_ctgry as trck , nm as prcs_nm , gpc_lvl as lvl , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=a.stduy_dd_cd) as edu_dd_cnt , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=a.stduy_time_cd) as edu_time , gpc_fxnum_cnt as max_cnt , gpc_rfn_prcs as rfnd_prcs , gpc_isttr_id as adm_seq , pc_stduy_cntn as edu_dtl , itrdc_cntn as edu_cntn , date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') as kap_send_dd , CONCAT('https://www.kapkorea.org/education/apply/detail?detailsKey=', edctn_seq) AS kap_url from ed_edctn_prcs_mst a WHERE exps_yn = 'Y' AND gpc_yn = 'Y' AND DATE_FORMAT(#{date}, '%Y-%m-%d') <= mod_dtm

SELECT /* COGpcReceiveRestMapper.selectGpcEpisdList */ a.edctn_seq as kap_seq , a.episd_seq as kap_schd_seq , b.gpc_parnt_ctgry as ctgry , b.gpc_edctn_type as edu_type , b.gpc_ctgry as trck , b.nm as prcs_nm , b.gpc_lvl as lvl , date_format(a.episd_year, '%Y') as edu_year , a.episd_ord as ord , date_format(a.edctn_strt_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d') as edu_strt , date_format(a.edctn_end_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d') as edu_end , date_format(a.accs_strt_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d') as rqst_strt , date_format(a.accs_end_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d') as rqst_end , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=b.stduy_time_cd) as edu_time , a.fxnum_cnt as max_cnt , (select count(mem_seq) from ep_edctn_ptcpt_mst where edctn_seq = a.edctn_seq and episd_year = a.episd_year and episd_ord = a.episd_ord and stts_cd = 'EDU_STTS_CD01') as rqst_cnt , b.gpc_rfn_prcs as rfnd_prcs , b.gpc_isttr_id as adm_seq , date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') as kap_send_dd , case edctn_stts_cd when 'EDCTN_STTS_CD01' then CASE WHEN edctn_cmpltn_yn = 'Y' then 'Y' ELSE 'N' END WHEN 'EDCTN_STTS_CD02' then 'X' END exam_flag from ed_edctn_episd_mst a left join ed_edctn_prcs_mst b on b.edctn_seq = a.edctn_seq where a.exps_yn = 'Y' and b.gpc_yn = 'Y' and a.episd_gpc_yn = 'Y' and DATE_FORMAT(A.edctn_strt_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL -6 MONTH), '%Y-%m-%d') and a.edctn_seq = #{kapSeq}

SELECT /* COGpcReceiveRestMapper.selectGpcPtcptList */ C.EDCTN_SEQ AS kap_Seq , B.EPISD_SEQ AS kap_Schd_Seq , D.ID AS kapId , D.NAME , CASE D.gndr WHEN 1 THEN 'M' ELSE 'F' END AS gndr_Cd , E.cmpn_nm , C.gpc_parnt_ctgry AS ctgry , C.gpc_ctgry AS trck , C.NM AS prcsNm , C.gpc_lvl AS lvl , B.EPISD_ORD AS ORD , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd=C.stduy_dd_cd) as edu_dd_cnt , date_format(b.edctn_strt_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d') as edu_strt , date_format(b.edctn_end_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d') as edu_end , C.gpc_rfn_prcs AS rfnd_Prcs , date_format(A.reg_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as reporting_dt , date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') as kap_send_dd
FROM ep_edctn_ptcpt_mst A LEFT JOIN ed_edctn_episd_mst B ON B.EPISD_SEQ = A.EPISD_SEQ LEFT JOIN ed_edctn_prcs_mst C ON C.EDCTN_SEQ = B.EDCTN_SEQ LEFT JOIN co_mem_mst D ON D.mem_seq = A.mem_seq LEFT JOIN cp_cmpn_mst E ON E.bsnm_no = A.ptcpt_bsnm_no
WHERE 1=1 AND A.EPISD_SEQ = #{kapSchdSeq} AND a.STTS_CD = 'EDU_STTS_CD01' and C.gpc_yn = 'Y'

SELECT /* COGpcReceiveRestMapper.selectGpcPtcptExamList */ kap_seq /* KAP 과정 순번 */ , kap_schd_seq /* KAP 회차 순번 */ , kap_id /* KAP 회원 id */ , CASE WHEN jdgmt_yn = 'Y' THEN IFNULL(ROUND((0.8 * att_score) + (0.2 * (kap_score/max_score * 100)), 0), 0) ELSE att_score END AS tot_score /* GPC 총점 */ , kap_score /* KAP 평가 점수 */ , att_score /* KAP 출석 점수 */ , cmplt_yn /* 이수 여부 (S Y N U E) */ , kap_send_dd /* 데이터 GPC로 전송일 */ FROM ( SELECT C.edctn_seq as kap_seq , B.episd_seq as kap_schd_seq , D.id as kap_id , A.exam_score as kap_score , A.cmptn_yn as cmplt_yn , date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') as kap_send_dd , C.jdgmt_yn , (SELECT IFNULL(ROUND((count(atndc_dtm) / COUNT(edctn_dt))*100, 0), 0) AS atndc_avg FROM ep_edctn_atndc_dtl WHERE ptcpt_Seq = A.PTCPT_SEQ) AS att_score , (SELECT SUM(Ifnull(scord, 0)) from ex_exam_qstn_dtl where exam_seq = E.exam_seq) AS max_score FROM ep_edctn_ptcpt_mst A LEFT JOIN ed_edctn_episd_mst B ON B.EPISD_SEQ = A.EPISD_SEQ LEFT JOIN ed_edctn_prcs_mst C ON C.EDCTN_SEQ = B.EDCTN_SEQ LEFT JOIN co_mem_mst D ON D.mem_seq = A.mem_seq LEFT JOIN ep_edctn_exam_ptcpt_mst E ON E.ptcpt_seq = A.ptcpt_seq WHERE 1=1 AND A.EPISD_SEQ = #{kapSchdSeq} AND a.STTS_CD = 'EDU_STTS_CD01' AND C.gpc_yn = 'Y' ) MST
